text: Gheorghe Berceanu (28 December 1949 – 30 August 2022) was a Romanian light- flyweight Greco-Roman wrestler. He won the world title in 1969 and 1972. He won an Olympic gold medal in 1972 in Munich and a silver in 1976 in Montreal.Berceanu, Gheorghe (ROU). iat.uni-leipzig.de Berceanu spent most of his career at Steaua București, and later worked there as a coach. Berceanu died on 30 August 2022, at the age of 72. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for Romania Category:Olympic silver medalists for Romania Category:Wrestlers
title: Gheorghe Berceanu
